definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: This is a Millipede , but it's a giant !
sentences.chinese: 它是千足蟲，但是個頭很大。

sentences.english: Snake has hundreds and hundreds of legs, but no eyes, until he meets Millipede.
sentences.chinese: 小蛇在遇到千足蟲之前是有上百隻腳的只是沒有眼睛。

sentences.english: When I find a millipede insect, I rub it over my body.
sentences.chinese: 當我找到一隻千足蟲昆蟲，我會在我身上摩擦它。

sentences.english: Capuchin monkeys often rub their bodies with a certain type of millipede.
sentences.chinese: 捲尾猴經常擦用某種類型的千足蟲的身體。

sentences.english: And the pink millipedes of Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 還有泰國的粉紅色千足蟲。

sentences.english: I find a millipede insect and rub it over my body.
sentences.chinese: 我找到了一隻千足蟲，就在身體上磨擦。
